text: During this first meeting, we setup necessary software and tried to connect to Ghoul, and ev3 device, from VS Code.
Although we tried other ev3 bricks and a variety of troubleshooting techniques, we were unable to get an ev3 to connect to VS Code.
We looked into options for physical systems, comparing different Arduino kits. We also planned the general structure for the code, creating a python prototpe of the algorithm
We started interacting with the physical system. We made connection with Bluetooth Low Energy and were able to control the individual motors with code.
